content.detailedDescription:
This happened in pont-landry, nb, canada.  a neighbor village to mine.  this is the video they placed on facebook.  published by *(name deleted -- cms/sg).

*(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was on winscott, about to turn onto lakeside, when i noticed what at first i thought were football stadium lights.  by the time i turned onto lakeside, i realized there was no stadium in that direction and the lights were too big anyway.  i pulled over and watched as a large, dark, triangular shaped object floated silently over me.  it had 3 large white, unblinking lights on one side only (the lights that i had originally thought to be stadium lights)and was moving quite slowly, with no sound.  it was coming from the direction of the lake moving toward the direction of the military joint reserve base in fort worth, roughly se to nw. it eventually faded into the distance (by this time my line of sight was such that i could no longer see the lights, just the shadow of the vehicle.)  i just kept asking myself "am i really seeing this?"  it was like nothing i've ever seen before or since.
content.summary: Dark triangle shape with 3 bright unblinking white lights on one side

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired school teacher.I always wanted to tell my ufo sighting to dr stanton friedman.It always stayed fresh in my memory because every year my students wanted to hear my story and most of them believed it.It all began on a winter evening 1964 or 1965 at around 7 or 8 o`clock.I had spend the day at my girlfriend's house and i had to walk 3 miles to get home in kneedeep snow after a snow storm.All of a sudden there was light all around me.I could not see where it came from as there was just but one house behind me.I remember thinking it could be the snowplow or somebody with a big light.After a 360 degree turn i looked up and there it was,a big cigar shape objet with rolling lights.If i had to put a distance i would say it was about a thouand feet up.Sadly i only had a few seconds of sigthing.It never made any sound and it was not moving.I was very impressed my the lights that were moving, but i never had the time to be scare. i admit to being a little shaky afterward.The ufo dissapeared in a northward direction from 0 to incredible speed leaving a flash of light,and not a sound.I had never seen anything like it before and i have never seen anything like it since.As most sightings,there were no witnesses even though i tried hard to find some.
content.summary: I saw a cigar shape objet in the sky with rolling lights,no sounds,not moving, that dissapeared with incredible speed.              i

content.detailedDescription: My son chris was returning from school in the evening,while sitting in his mothers truck expedition,in the back seat,looking around,some lights to his right caught his attention,he believed it to be a ufo right away because of its circle,saucer,disk shape,lights,red,blue underneath, around the saucer,steady lights launching itself out of a what seems to be like sugar cane field,out and past in front of the vehicle,stopped over a house then vanished in front of him. his feelings were of surprised,excited,happy,his reaction was he yelled to his mother mommy look up to that house, the mother says she saw nothing, then the object vanished. and this cught him by surprise amazed how it just vanished,the child says it was about the size of the ford expedition,where he then got a headache.
content.summary: My son witnessed this ufo launching out of like sugar cane field , flew in front of truck, hovered over house, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
this is kind of hard to explain without drawing a picture, but i will try. my father, myself, and my brother-in-law all witnessed this event although my brother-in-law *(name deleted--cms/sg) was in a different area at the time but no further than a mile away. my father and i were standing outside at dusk. it was not completely dark but close. i believe the moon was farely bright also. a thin layer of clouds could be seen almost like a fog but higher up in the sky. my father and myself had been talking and we happened to notice what at first appeared to be a plane or something similar, but as we watched this "red-orange" object it began to rise from the horizon/tree line straight up without making any noise. as it got further from the horizon/treeline it began to glow more intense and then slowly it appeared to emit a conic shaped light upwards from the object in the same red-orange color. it continued to do this until it finally disappeared. however a circular hole could be seen in the clouds that i discribed earlier. my husband had been deer hunting with his brother. my husband did not see anything but when i tried to tell him what we had witnessed he said, "i know i know tracey saw it too. he almost knocked me out of the tree stand. he kept yelling there is a "v" in the sky. this was the way in which he discribed it. 
    there was supposed to be a meteor shower within 3 days or so of our sighting, but i have watched meteor showers in the past and not one single time did i see one rise from the horizon and do this. they general streak across the sky and do not remain visible for that length of time.
    could anyone tell me if this is something that could easily be explained? this has bother me for sometime because i do not know what we saw.        
                                                 thank you
                                          **(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red-orange glowing ball

content.detailedDescription: While i was walking my dog and my brothers i looked up i saw 3 stars in perfectly spaced alignment then back down about a second later the stars moved half way across the sky then again then back to the starting position
content.summary: Moveing stars

content.detailedDescription: Looking ne at 10:45 a.M., noticed three seperate contrails forming very close together, but definitely seperate.All three were ascending at a 90 degree angle. this caught my attention, as i have been observing strange aerial phenomenom for at least two years now. i focused on one and saw a white oval shaped object dart away from the contrail and descend very rapidly! for the rest of the day contrails were forming e to w creating a blue and white striped sky. the contrail themselves are a mystery and seem to be related to orb presence. on 12/15 i observed a black oval object leave an area of contrails. exactly like the photo from mo posted on report page right now. i agree with the witness in mo when they say that these contrails don't dissapate like normal jet contrails. i have seen the same thing countless times now. when i try to view the maker of the contrail with binoculars, i sometimes see a long dull gray plane with no markings. othe times i see a small, highly reflective object that appears to be a plane length ahead of the contrail! kind of bouncing around. i haven't reported anything for a few months now, but felt compelled to today. end of the year thing. maybe. anyway, on 12/2 i saw two white strobing orbs floating right near each other. the next thing i know, they turn pale orange, get bigger, and ascend rapidly out of sight. other phenomenom that i personally feel are connected: blue and pink auras in the clouds, but not near the sun which would explain the colors, white flashes of light at night. also blue. orbs that look like common stars until they start moving, ascending, descending, merging with others, make sharp turns, blink on and off,fly in really low, to name a few.  colors of the orbs range from white to amber to yellow. i have been seeing strange things like this consistently. how i feel? bewildered awe. happy new year mufon, i'm sure you'll be hearing from me in 2011.
content.summary: Unusual contrails and unknown objects near them

content.detailedDescription:
Wed evening 12/22/2010 somewhere between 6pm and 7pm - went outside to see why my dog was barking and having a fit; noticed a really bright object through the tree line moving from south to north; we live in a rural area, with very little low flying air trafic, especially after dark. it is very unusual to see something that low and that bright in the sky in this area.  at first i thougt it may be the life flight helicopter landing - but there was no noise, and my dog was barking at it - he has never barked at life flight when it has flown over before.
  this bright light was moving very slow and was very bright white;no other colors were visable. i kept my eye on it, as i started walking down the driveway to get past the trees to get a good look at it.  it was low, could not have been any higher than 2 or 3 thousand feet, maybe the height of a radio transmitter tower.  as i was getting even with the tree line, the object started to make a slow arching turn towards the east, and began to speed up.  when i cleard the trees and was standing in the open pasture, the object was gaining altitude; then suddenly accelerated to the east and was out of sight in less than a second - with absolutley no noise. struck me as wierd; i have seen things in the sky before - but for some reason - this bugged me.  i have told my husband (who arrived home about 20 minutes after the sighting) about this - but have not told anyone else.  i keep a camera handy - but did not take it with me, because i was just going out to find out why my dog was barking - not expecting to see something.
content.summary: Extremely bright starlike object slowly passes by then accelerates out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were sitting on deck steps and talking (we had nothing to drink and no mind altering substances of any kind!!!)....Looked up and our jaws dropped. my husband is not a believer in ufo's but cannot explain that. it seemed to go so slowly. no noise at all. very slow. covered in amber lights....Vanished after 5 minutes.. size of football field. bronzish in color just covered in amber lights......I have since read about accidentally summoning motherships.....I wonder if either one of us accidentally did this!!!! now my husband believes....And he is an analytical scientific "prove it to me" type. maybe thats why he saw it too!!!! it was flying from our left to the right ....After 5 minutes it vanished into thin air!!!! (to our right)
content.summary: Low in sky near roof of house...Silent....Slow....Amber lights....As big as football field...Rectangu

content.detailedDescription:
As i was taking the trash to the street,and it was around 7:35pm est and i looked up in the sw sky and noticed a shooting star coming down really fast.  this was the first one i have seen.  after that, i looked up again and saw a ball of light-which resembled a sphere.  it was moving se and then all of sudden, it blinked and in it's place, there were two objects that moved in opposite directions, one continued moving se and then the other went nw.  

did anyone else see this?
content.summary: Shooting star ?

content.detailedDescription: I tried submitting this earlier but there was an error with your form. if you want more information contact me. i dont have time to retype it again. thankyou
content.summary: Orange balls/orbs/objects hovering an navigating independently of each other

content.detailedDescription:
Since november, 2010, i have seen with naked eye a very bright linear, star-like object in the western sky above bhc, az. the first night, i tried to take a picture of it with my phone camera. the moon was very bright and the object did not show in the picture. it appears stationary but possibly rotating on axis,  it is brightest object in the sky.  i can at times see a green line and red tips. one night in particular, i saw a small light, flashing, that moved to and from the object. it can be seen on clear nights.  it does not appear to move around but is at different places in the night sky, in the west. recently, i have noted more same star-shape, linear objects that appear to be more distant. last night, my daughter said that she saw 3 very bright objects of the same description, much closer, more south, and producing bright light. she lives more east, on higher ground and saw several objects, again more distant than the 3 she saw. 
i do not believe it is a planet...Too linear.  i took pictures with my phone tonight and they show a green, round object. the picture looks nothing like the object with the naked eye.  i do not have a quality camera or telescope.
content.summary: Every clear night for past 2 months.  very bright object, linear like star with one green line and red tips in western sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my daughters house having a cigarette after thanksgiving dinner. i happened to look up to the northwest sky and saw this huge object moving very slowy from the northwest to the southeast. it caught my attention as it was glowing very brightly. i watched the object as it moved to the southeast of me. it was approx. 10,000 feet high. once it got about 3 to 4 miles se of where  i was standing  all of a sudden there was  a huge  circular flash of  white light. it had to have been at least a mile wide.  an instant later there was a small white object that shot  out of the top at about a 15 degree angle. it disapered in less than 2 seconds. after that event the white light disapered and the large amber colored object took off and all you saw was a amber streak of light,it completely blew my mind. if i would of had viedo of this it would prove once and for all that we are not alone. i told my family what i saw but no one belevied me. this is my second report on this .I reported it to mufon last year and was contacted by a mufon rep. i never heard any more about it. i dont think anyone beleives me. i would be willing to take a lie dectector test if that would help.
content.summary: Bright amber color moving very slowy

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out my south city back door and couldn't help but notice a long vapor trail stretching from my left almost directly over my house and lengthening in an otherwise completely cloudless and clear sky. i have seen similar circumstances before, where planes could be seen emitting the vapor trail, but no plane could be seen emitting this vapor trail! i ran inside and got my camera and took 15 pictures over five minutes of this phenomenon as it continued on, the vapor trail basically going east to west. the vapor trail being emitted was different than commercial airliners that were also in the sky at that same time, which i did take pictures of them but did not include. all the other planes could been seen and had their vapor trails dissipate within 30 or so lengths of the plane, where the vapor trailed the plane for that relatively short distance of space right behind it. but, this vapor trail stayed much longer in the sky and, when it dissipated, it did so in segments far trailing the head of the vapor trail, which i have pictures of. as can be seen in the three included images, the last one enlarged, no craft nor object - nothing - can be seen emitting the vapor: it appears the vapor is just manifesting itself across the sky! "logically" it would seem that such is actually what's happening somehow, or, that an invisible object is creating the vapor trail. are these "reasonable" explanations? if it can be even more strange, the picture taken at 4:29:01 pm ct had a dark object in the bottom left corner, the only image with this anomaly in it - indicating it is probably not a camera anomaly because it's never repeated in the other 14 pictures. enlarged, this object appears to look like an arrow head, and if a line is drawn in the direction the arrow head is pointing, it is pointing at the head of the vapor trail manifestation!!
content.summary: Vapor trail materialized over st. louis from no visible craft

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on hwy 96 at 6pm three occupants noticed a bright object hovering while displaying five white lights to the north of our vehicle. we estimate the object was hovering over hillsboro pike somewhere between grassland middle school and further north to the intersection of old hickory and hillsboro. because it hovered in place without motion, we decided to redirect our van by turning off hwy 96 turning left to point north so we could pull of the road near gentry farm to simply observe it. we observed it for several more minutes then simply "glided" away to our right moving northeast, without any noticable acceleration. it didn't seem to turn upon moving so it maintained its visual impression upon us until it departed out of our field of vision.
content.summary: Hovering bright object with five white lights

content.detailedDescription: I took our dog for a short walk with my young son. it was after 5.45pm because it was already dark outside. we went to the field behind our house and i looked up to the sky like i do always when the sky is clear and you can see all the stars. i saw this bright light and i said to my son "look at that bright star" but as i said it i realized that this particular time in the evening there's no big star at that part of the sky. and also this "star" was moving from south to north at the speed of an airplane only there was no sound and i couldn't see no other lights around it. we were staring at it and were really excited and i really can't tell how long it went on at this slower speed. but then suddenly it started to go towards east at higher speed and all we could see was reddish light before it disappeared completely in ab 8 seconds. as i said the sky was clear and there was no wind.
content.summary: Star-like object moving slowly from south to north before disappearing at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving in our car from east hampton to watermill on long island, ny. we were traveling on route 27 heading west. we were driving at approximately 45 miles per hour. there are no street lights on this part of the road (at the corner of scuttle hole road.
my husband spotted something in the sky to our right (northwest) and told me to look. i saw a circular image that was pale and whitish. it was moving very fast towards the northwest. it was also descending. it reminded me of a flashlight shining on a wall or those projection type lights that car sale lots will use to advertise a sale. except those are usually in pairs and crisscross and don't disappear. this light darted.
my husband, who saw it for a few seconds long than myself, described it as "more white than gold. like a roman candle firework that was going down instead of up." he agreed with me on the direction that it was traveling. he also used the words, "meteor", "fireball", and "explosion" to describe it.
i saw it for about 5 seconds; my husband for about 10 but that is a rough estimate. it then just diapered almost like a flashlight would if you suddenly turned it off.
there is a military base on long island so we considered that it might be something from there that had exploded. my husband asked me if i could see a fire on the ground. i didn't but it was dark and there were many trees obstructing my view.
confusion is the emotion that would best describe how we felt. that and awe.
content.shape: Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Quick burst in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday december 28th at exactly 5 pm, i was looking out the back window of my third floor window. i have an unobstructed view to the west, as i live in the roxborough/manayunk section of the city, with an elevation of 300' above sea level. i was finishing my work on the computer, and had previously watched the sunset, which occurs at 4:43pm on this date. every clear day, it is like watching a pacific sunset, as the sky becomes golden, filled with layers of red and blue as time progresses. after sunset, i was attracted to the window just to continue to watch the sky change. due west, over the rooftops and towards the tree line which marks the schuylkill expressway about 3 miles away, i noted three objects of intense brightness which stood out above the sunset. the clearest one was almost on a straight line from me, about 30 degrees above the tree line. its distance is hard to measure, but i would estimate anywhere from 5-10 miles at least. the clearest intensely bright object appeared spherical, or round. off to the right, about 40 to 45 degrees and separated by at least ten miles, were two bright objects which looked more like streaks oriented left to right on a tilt from my perspective, bottom to top. though it was too far to see these objects moving, their movement was discernible by reference to fixed objects. what made this interesting, was that if this was weather phenomena, the objects went in different paths, the "streaks" moved up and towards the right, which is wnw, while the bright sphere/orb appeared to move right to left before fading from view after 5 minutes observation. these objections were so bright they stood out against the afterglow of sunset, at least 10x brighter than the surrounding sky. i never hesitated in my feeling that these were unnatural objects due to their intensity, and the strangeness of their appearance as i have observed innumerable sunsets and never saw this before. all three objects seemed to grow more distant and fade into the sky. the only "camera" i had was a 3 megapixel iphone 3gs. i am attaching the one picture, untouched ( i can "edit" in iphoto playing with contrast and other features ) but the orb is slightly visible over the fireplace of the house in the foreground. i am referring to the house with snow on both sides of the chimney, almost exactly in the center of the photo. i had used the zoom application on the camera, but couldn't see the object in the viewfinder at the time i was looking right at it, when taking it in the iphone. it was only after uploading the photo i saw it did appear exactly where i knew to look, over the fireplace of the house in the center of the photo.This is truly a case of the picture not doing justice to the subject, as even while i was looking at the iphone picture full screen as i was taking it, i could barely see what was so clear to the naked eye. i only wish i had my camera, with its great resolution and zoom, but was in my car. i can state i have never seen anything like this before. p.S. i was wearing my corrective lenses, but these objects were visible without them!!
content.summary: I saw three objects 17 minutes after sunset looking due west from my home on third floor.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend patti and i were down by the train bridge where the ct river empties into the ocean. we took many pictures that day but one of them, a self picture of us with the sun setting behind us had a strange object in it when we looked at the pictures later.
we were looking and taking pictures all over the sky and ocean that day. beautiful cloudless sunny day. i do not recall seeing anything in the sky at the time we were taking this photo. the picture of us is not great but there is an object between us that looks fairly large when compared to the bridge behind us. you have to zoom in to get a good look at it. 
a week later we saw another ufo at the same location same conditions. this one was very large and white. it was moving very slow from right to left over the smoke stack across the water that you can see in the picture. we both watched it for about a minute and it disappeared in the time it took me to reach down for my camera!
we both said it was moving too slow to be any type of aircraft. and it just looked like a very large very white "blob" or orb at least the size of a football field.
content.summary: Took photo and saw ufo when looking at pictures later

content.detailedDescription:
Please forgive any grammatical greviences and spelling errors.

at 1842 hrs, on the night of december 27th, 2010, i was waiting at a bus stop for my ride to work. the night was clear with little to no cloud cover. 

i was distracted and looking around waiting for the bus to arrive, thinking "a watched pot never boils," when something from the corner of my eye caught my attention. what appeared to be a bright flash drew my attention to the sky. the object was to my w-nw at approximately 10 o'clock from my perspective, and i was facing north on the street. as to what altitude it was at i can not guess, as at night, anything with a light on it could be 100 feet up or out into the atmosphere for all i know. all i do know was that it was in the direction of a flight path for the international airport, and appeared to be at the same, or at similar altitude that the aircraft fly at. it was just a bright blue-ish white object that was flying at a leisurely pace in a n-ne direction. 

at first i thought it to be an aircraft, namely the night patrol helicopter that is often overhead my neighborhood. however, this was not like the helicopter. now please bear with me but this is the part that confused me. the light was too bright and to, uh, "pure" to be the helicopter. with the patrol helicopter's lights, they appear to be, well, white, with no idications of color, and often i can see the beam, or at least the "starburst pattern" when the light is directed in my direction. the rotating beacons on the copter can be seen as well, so when the light is not on, you can see the tail and the red/green indicator lights. 

the light on what i saw was very bright and just on the blue side of white. it didn't appear to be a directed beam either, but like a light source viewed from a distance. the brightness of it is what caught my attention. it was bright enough to divert my attention away from the passing cars and street lights. as i watched the object, i noted that it was heading in an apparent n-ne direction, and at a speed that would put it out of my field of view behind a building across the street in several seconds. 

it was shortly after i noticed it that the light began to fade. this is why it stood out to me. the light just got dimmer, until it looked like a small dim orange light, as opposed to the bright blue. not just like a light shutting off, but visibly got dimmer.  no indicator lights, no rotating tail beacons. the dim orange light was a little dimmer than some of the stars that were observable at that time. the dimmer light did not change course either. just continued on it's n-ne course. it was then that the object was obsecured by the building, and my bus was visible at the end of the street. when i got off the bus later, i continued to look for the light to the north, but it had been several minutes on the bus and i did not expect to see anything. 

the whole incident couldn't have been more than 10-20 seconds. i myself felt nothing in relation to the object, except perhaps curiosity.

 i can only conclude that this objet was either space debris, or perhaps a polar orbit satellite. i assumed it to be glint from a satellite's panels, so i checked online to see if anything was transiting, but no satellites were reported transiting my area at that time. it didn't have the repeating pattern from rotating that is often found in space debris either. but as i didn't observe the object with any length of time, i cannot make any firm conclusions.
content.summary: Bright bluish white light, faded to dim orange then moved in a n. ne. direction out of fov

content.detailedDescription:
it was an early summer morning, about 0345. three of my friends and i were out on a second floor balcony, talking and smoking cigarettes. there is a large tree to your right when you're standing on this balcony looking out onto the street. the neighborhood is in a condo complex near the water in foster city, ca. 
  anyway, we were chatting away, when out of the corner of my eye i saw this orb appear from behind the tree. it arced out from behind this tree from my right to left. i was the first to notice it as it silently hovered no more than ten feet away from us at eye level. it was about 8-10 inches in diameter. the only way i can describe it is that it looked like a ball of plasma, the insides of it seemed to be moving. it was changing colors also, vivid reds and blues, pinks and orange; it was absolutely beautiful, like "living light". it didn't seen to emit light. it's hard to describe. it's like the light was internal, contained. after a few seconds my three friends noticed it too. the conversation fell silent and all four of us just stood there dumbfounded, staring at it. i remember it seemed difficult to focus on, it's as if my eyes couldn't get a sharp look at what exactly it was. it hovered there for about 20 seconds, then it seemed to notice that we had noticed it (we all got really quiet and were staring at it at this point). the plasma ball silently floated away to our right and disappeared behind the tree where it had appeared from.
  we stood there shocked. nobody said a word for a minute that seemed like an eternity. i asked my friends "did you guys see that?" and they said "yeah". none of us could explain what it was. the funny thing is, none of us ever really talk about what we saw that night. i'll ask them from time to time if they remember that night, and they do. none of us can come up with an explanation of what the hell we saw.
  years later, i can't shake the feeling that there was some kind of intelligence behind it. it's hard to explain. the way it moved was very precise and deliberate. at the time, it felt like it was watching us. i think about it every day and hope to find out what it really is we saw that night.
content.summary: Glowing orb not ten feet away caught observing by  four witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work around 6:15pm on december 27th 2010 and on the kenai spur hwy in kenai alaska i saw a bread shape boject with three bright lights across it and it wasn't really moving it wasnt blinking and 30 seconds later i look again and its gone. and i never saw it again
content.summary: disc object with bright lights at night near soldotna, alaska

content.detailedDescription:
My bestfriend stephanie and i went to the movies one night and came home around twelve. we got ready for bed, went to my room on the second story of my house and opened up my window to look at the night sky and smoke a couple cigarettes as we do sometimes before we sleep. my house is in a new development, the development was built on what used to be a bunch of farms, a couple ranches still surrounding. my house is in the coner of the development, i have no neighbors to the right and only one to the left, a house slightly smaller than our own. feilds surround our houses, very little light obstucts the night sky, it is always a very clear veiw.

anyways, we're staring off towards where the stanislaus river would be, enjoying our smokes and an orb shoots into the sky, perfectly. about 50 feet staight up and stops. we watch it hover for about a minute, the only way to describe it's movements is perfect, precise, elegant as it started to "float" or "hover" towards my neighborhood. it went behind a couple houses beyond our veiw and we thought "oh, well that was it" and continued with our smokes.

still staring down my street and into the sky a bit in awe of what we had seen a deep eerie silence took to the surroundings,and it appears again. only this time hovering symetrically, parallel to the road and towards my house. it was only about 20 feet in the air and slow. of course, we started screaming the closer it got. loud! my sister was in the room right next to us, her bed directly on the other side of the wall where mine was. she had gone to bed. i am positive she did not have enough time to reach sleep, let alone a deep sleep. she did not wake up from our screaming. neither did my parents, who were just down the hall and sleep with their door wide open. it was completely silent except for our terror.

as the object approached my house, let me tell you, the color was amber, yellow, red. the orb did not glare or hurt our eyes to look at. i shut my window yet my blinds were still open and we stopped screaming. it hovered directly in front of my house for about 30 seconds, it seemed to be on the streetlight, but not physically harming anything. the orb then shot off, so fast, to left of my neighbors house into the feild behind our houses. the streetlight was out for a moment and then flickered gradually back to on. i opened my window and we were leaning out onto the roof for just one more glipse of this unknown object. the feild was alight, a glow coming from it and turning everything sepia colored around us. we felt so calm, and like we wanted to see "them" communicate with "them". it was a tranquil feeling, like everything would be alright.

we were listening to a mix cd that had seemed to stop playing throughout this experience. we sat on my bed in awe and a song startled us a bit, from just starting to play. the lyrics are what may have alerted us, "something tells me this isn't real, something tells me not to care."

that is really how we felt, you know? ironic, along with the fact that the cd was made that day and we just happened upon that song.
we left my window open for awhile trying to get just one more sighting, just to feel that almost comforting, calm, and tranquil feeling again.

what has brought me to giving my experience to mufon, is that i've seen more unexplained events afterwards. orbs that turn into airplanes, some star treck/star wars looking craft hovering above a feild just 15 feet above the ground and rising slowly. i have never seen white owls until after my first experience. i know how stupid it sounds but research i've done makes me believe owls have something more to them. i mean i've seen 7 owls take off my roof uniformly, in a v-shape towards where i saw the first amber orb. shortly after they were out of sight i saw a white orb, in the same spot as the amber one, flight to to same highth in the sky, turn amber and almost flatten to disappear. i watched for about an hour and it did not go down my street this time, unfortunately.

there are very many witnesses to these owls, and a friend of my sister, who experienced the phoenix light phenomena (amber orbs) in the nineties has had strange dreams and experiences since moving to stanislas county.

friend's of mine, and people i don't even know have reported seeing these amber orbs. in daytime, nightime, dusk, dawn, twighlight. everyday school kids are seeing the orbs that turn into airplanes, a new one every week.

i actually saw one while trying to describe them to one of my friends, sitting in his car around the coner from my house one night. he saw this also. my sister and her boyfriend said they had seen a strange airplane at the same time i had when i got home, they had asked me before i had said anything if i had seen it.

so many multiplying strange events have happend since the first.
an amber orb following my sister's boyfriend home from work, just twenty feet above his truck and mimicking his speed, almost messing with him. he felt calm, and in awe.

so many similar, strange and unexplainable events. i don't know what to think anymore. i really think mufon should reasearch this area of california. i really do. sightings and experiences are increasing as the year ends, i can't wait to see what is in store for our nation in 2007.
i have never experienced a ufo or unexplainable event until 2010, and it is no shock that i found out it is the year for ufo's in california.
we are infested.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: My bestfriend and i were leaning out my window staring at the night sky and an orb shot straight up into the sky and made its way to my house

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on cleveland ave, when the car in front of me put his breaks on and started to swerve like he wasn't paying attention. then something caught the corner of my eye and i looked up to see a large flying craft. i pulled over as did the car in front of me and the car behind me. all of us got out to look at this thing. it was triangular in shape with 2 red lights on one side and a large glowing white orb in the centre. it was approximately 2000ft in the air, completely silent, flying in a west to east direction. the colour of the craft was a white-greyish colour. it looked like there was something on the back of it, or like the back was a square, but it was really hard to tell. there were also 2 jets flying over the craft, turning around and coming back. i tried to film it with my camera phone but i'm unable to make anything out. i lost sight of the object over the treeline.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo with 2 red lights on side and one white orb in middle of craft sighted over cleveland ave

content.detailedDescription:
Was just looking at the bbc website and they are showing the ca storm damage, last photo shows the double rainbow that someone posted on 12/22, it also shows some round objects too, just like the person reported almost a week ago.

*(link moved to additional evidence section---cms/sg).
content.summary: The double rainbow and event

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was driving, and i was riding in the front passenger seat.  we were returning to our home in overland park from a christmas visit with my parents in wichita.  we were taking i-35, traveling northeast, and the sighting occurred near gardener, ks.  the drive had gone smoothly so far; it was a cold, clear night, and we were relaxed and chatting intermittently.  i was staring out the front windshield when my husband pointed to the passenger side window and said, "there's a ufo."  because his tone was so casual, i looked out expecting to see a billboard or something else mundane. 

i saw three bright points of blue-white light, moving in a triangle formation.  the lights were flashing on and off rhythmically.  the flashes were fast, but not strobe-light fast.  the lights flashed perhaps 1-2 times per second.  the flashes were very regular, like a clock ticking.  i could not make out what the lights were attached to, so they could have been from one object or three objects moving in tight formation.  my husband said something like, "it can't be a plane because it's just hanging there."  however, as i watched the object, it appeared to be moving away from us and also weaving from side to side.  it seemed to be hovering like a helicopter rather than flying like a plane. 

our car was out of alignment and fairly noisy to drive, so i could not hear whether any sound came from the object.   

because the object was traveling the opposite direction we were driving, i did not get to watch it very long.  our car's rear windows were fogged up, so i was unable to watch the object once it was no longer in view from the front passenger side window.  

after the sighting, i regretted not having a camera handy and not being able to watch the object for a longer period of time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three lights

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, i guess the video is worth posting for a few reasons:
you can see how clear the day is,  the distance i would now lower my estimate to under a mile...That ridge is the saddle between armer and carr peaks in the sierra anches).
the object is behind the third pine tree to the left from the right edge.  you can clearly see the unnatural sparkle behind that tree.  those pines are an average of about 60' tall on that ridge.  the area used to be mined for uranium in the late 1800's and is between two national wildernesses.

the file name is "vanished" because at the time i thought i missed it on film, those viewfinder screens are not easy in open sunlight.
content.summary: #27130 report video attached

content.detailedDescription: Me and my roommate saw an unusually bright dot low on the horizon and took a couple photos of it. after about an hour when we looked again it was not there. we were home, hanging out on our terrace.
content.summary: Extremely bright fixed light low on the horizon...Disappeared after about an hour

content.detailedDescription:
I work in rancho cordova near the old mather air force base (between zinfandel and sunrise blvd).  i was out on my morning break, taking a walk in the back parking lot, and as i always do, i looked up.  it was then that i saw a white v-shaped object in the sky overhead.  it was very high up, and thus only half the size of my pinky nail at arms distance.  it had three lights on each side, because at one point it changed position, and all i could see was a strip of lights.  

the object was between rancho cordova and eldorado hills, and was moving very slowly.  i watched it for a good ten minutes trying desperately to get it in film with my sony camcorder.  however, because it was white against a light blue sky, the camcorder was unable to pick it up.  (when viewing my recording later i noticed that the recording blanked out several times).  it was still visible with the naked eye when i went back into the building at 9:20 am.

note:  there is a video on youtube that was filmed in the spring of 2010.  the owner captured the exact same i object i saw this morning, and interestingly enough, it, too, was filmed near the sierra foothills. *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

also, this is the third sighting i've had in the last week.  i reported one other sighting of a cube shaped object last week.  something must be going on.
content.summary: White v-shaped ufo seen over rancho cordova, ca

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on single lane state hwy 288 north before parker creek at 2pm.  notice a sphere very reflective and below armer mt. peak and just above sawmill flats campground.  it was just suspended in the very clear and bright blue sky.  it stood out like a christmas ball ornament, very surreal. i estimate it was about two miles ahead and about 1000 ft above my elevation, which was 4000ft.  i watched as i drove slowly about one minute and it was clearly not a plane, ballon, or helicopter (no flight path here at that altitude anyway)  and to0 large to be any kind of toy (well, maybe there are suv and bigger remote spheres?). i estimate it was at least 30' across.  i pulled over made grapped camera and tried to film.  it slipped behind the tree line, but the sparkel or the craft can be seen behind on large pin on the ridge, no detail though and not worth posting.  i continued the trip, noted only one retired type couple at saw mills and the rest of the forest quiet as this was on a thursday.  the only thing odd was that just before it began to dip dwn a darker band or shadow seemed to ring it completely like a darker band, whereas just prior the shadowing was as though it was a ball and with that familiar curvature.

i am posting this now because i have been spending some time watching night skies since and filming just to educate myself about how differnt events appear on film....To avoid gullibility with youtube postings (i have planes that look like missles etc b/c of contrails here...So i think a lot of nonsense on the videos...But some astounding stuff too.)  anyway, driving out toward yuma proving ground, the site of sightings back in 1997 for those who lived south of phoenix and prior to the phoenix lights.  we assumed then it was military related. i did report that to mufon a few months ago.  on one of those night trips a month ago a fairly obvious launch of some kind came from that direction....And i notice with closer inspection on google earth some pretty interesting patterns laid down by the military south of i-8 along the ajo highway....Can anyone explain why those patterns look like a compass or free mason type arrangments...It must have to do with bombing targets, and really just a coincidence, but it is odd...Just curious.  i guess i am starting to beleive our military has nore to say on this subject than they do.

finally, what really prompts this is a very short, lucid type dream...So lucid i though it happened and got up and looked out my window at about 4am today.  short - i was standing overlooking a valley and could see lights way off in distance.  warm night and then, just like movies i guess, i look directly up to see a nose, then wings, etc of a super large.. i mean a miles wide, delta type craft, fly over very low and silent and headed west out over those lights.  the detail i recall now is pretty weird.  i won't bother with that as it was a dream and my mind has been on ufo's since that october event.... but, it felt like i was looking over the sacramento river valley toward the west.

that's it.  only a few times in my life have i had such a vivid type dream...And each of those turned out to be prophetic about significant specific events in my life.  this didn't feel so personal, but had all the other "feel" of those few weird dreams of my distant past.  if i were to gamble i would bet i will (and based on that dream, many will) see some giant delta craft in our lives.  it did not alarm me at all, although it was rather aweinspiring,  i was clearly not a "player" in this dream, just a small observer.  i thought it odd i did not dream about the type of craft i so recently witnessed.

otherwise, i shall spend more time looking up and listening to those who witness the unexplainable!
content.summary: Highly reflective sphere at about 5000 ft altitude daytime
